preference.name: Report_Generate_Display_Locale_List
preference.preference_description: Specifies list of languages to be available in "Display Locale" list during Report generate. By default all Teamcenter supported locales will be available in the list. Just mention only code of the locale to display. Add en_US for English, de_DE for German, fr_FR for French, it_IT for Italian, es_ES for Spanish, pt_BR for Portuguese. ja_JP for Japanese, ko_KR for Korean, ru_RU for Russian, pl_PL for Polish, zh_CN for Chinese, zh_TW for Taiwanese, cs_CZ for Czech
